entry.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

entry.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
entry.content: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

entry.title: arsabolsky/Data-Barn-Ingest: A lightweight data ingestion system for Google Sheets. This project includes a RESTful API and a Google Apps Script backend that supports CSV and JSON data formats, with configurable operations like replace and append. Ideal for automating structured data uploads into Google Sheets via HTTP POST.
entry.content: A lightweight data ingestion system for Google Sheets. This project includes a RESTful API and a Google Apps Script backend that supports CSV and JSON data formats, with configurable operations like replace and append. Ideal for automating structured data uploads into Google Sheets via HTTP POST.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
